org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state

类 AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    S - The type of State.
    SD - The type of StateDescriptor.
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State, org.apache.flink.runtime.state.KvState<K,N,S,SD,RocksDBStateBackend>
    直接已知子类:
    RocksDBFoldingState, RocksDBListState, RocksDBReducingState, RocksDBValueState

    public abstract class AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends Object
implements org.apache.flink.runtime.state.KvState<K,N,S,SD,RocksDBStateBackend>, org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State
    Base class for State implementations that store state in a RocksDB database.

    State is not stored in this class but in the RocksDB instance that the RocksDBStateBackend manages and checkpoints.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected RocksDBStateBackend backend
      Backend that holds the actual RocksDB instance where we store state
      protected org.rocksdb.ColumnFamilyHandle columnFamily
      The column family of this particular instance of state

    • 构造器概要
